content: is dividing opinion on the internet, with some media outlets hailing it as "the most important video of the year" while others have been more sceptical.

tag: html body article div div div div p span
content: Beginning with a white man wearing a "Make America Great Again" cap who raps several racist tropes; a young black man then appears to tackle the stereotypes, before the two embrace at the end of the video. At the time of writing it had racked up almost 9m views in six days.

tag: html body article div div div div p em a span
html body article div div div div p span
content: called it "the brutal race conversation no one wants to have" and spoke to Lucas, who said the video is about "suppressed feelings that both parties have but are afraid to express".
